Nice product, smells good, docked a star for false claims to be natural-This is a good body wash product. It smells good and my wife often comments how much she likes it.

I would have given it five stars, but it really rankles me that the manufacturer is trying to pass this product off as "naturally derived." The number two ingredient after water is sodium lauryl sulfate (SLS), a surfactant and foaming agent that gives you that nice lathery feeling that tells you you're getting clean. Yes, it can be derived from coconut or palm oil rather than from petroleum, and I guess that's what the manufacturer means.

But it's still sodium lauryl sulfate, for Pete's sake. I'm no rampant environmentalist that is going to tell you SLS will give you cancer. The FDA has tested and approved it. But when folks look for natural ingredients, it's not usually SLS they are seeking. There are plenty of people who will tell SLS is very dangerous. Even mainstream folks recognize it can irritate sensitive skin.

Nice body wash. But don't tell me your SLS product is natural. Please. This is just betting on consumer ignorance.

BUT AMAZINGLY AFTER RINSING OFF THE SNAKE PEEL YOUR FACIAL SKIN AND BODY HAVE THE SOFTNESS OF A BABY'S BOTTOM. I DID A DOUBLE TAKE WHEN I SAW THAT AMAZON STOCKS/SELLS THIS AND HAD TO MAKE SURE THAT IT WAS THE SAME THING THAT I HAD USED YEAR'S AGO. BUYING THE THREE PACK OR MORE IS YOUR BEST BET..... Happy Customer-Dove body wash is my favorite! Thus is all I buy.
Excellent product-I love all the method products. Their body wash is awesome which is no surprise.
I wish it shipped I love cremo and this forest blend is by far the best . I love the Wilderness and smells .
I Love It-For the price, it was incredibly worth it. The smell is great, and for the price, I would definitely buy again. One bottle alone can last a month or two.

Yes-Great value. Has literally revived my sex life. Thanks oldspice!
Would reccomend-Product arrived in good condition. My skin feels nice after washing and I enjoy the scent. Would reccomend.
Mild scent-Nice mild scent but very thick and gelatinous; hard to squeeze out of the bottle.
perfect scent-This is a great body wash. I love the scent and the foaming capability is very nice. I do wish that it had more soap in it though as it seems like I go through it too fast.

Grrreatt-This smells nice, i like the soothing smell of it. This definitely gets the job done. It actually does moisturize . Leaves you feeling clean, and the nice fresh smell just stays with you all day...
Hard to find*-Awesome, hard to find scent at a great price with super fast shipping.

Cleans the face well and leaves nothing behind. Easy to use. Rinses off quickly. I would highly recommend this product to all men looking for a great face wash. (This review was collected as part of a promotion.)
Feeling good-It works really well keeps my skin moist!
Great Body Wash!-Hubby loves this particular body wash! Delighted to find it on Amazon.

Amazingly refreshing-Harry has undoubtably done it again with this amazing body wash it complements the other skin care products that they have undoubtedly 100% I love the lather but the clean and fresh smell that tops it off is amazing [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Recommend-Recommend this great value for body wash. Both my husband and I use it. As a female I appreciate the scent, as I find it very natural and soothing and not strictly masculine.

Big Consistency Issues-I didn't realize how much I could hate a shower gel. The consistency of this product is like jell-o - you need to use all your strength just to squeeze a little out of the bottle.

Great body wash-This was a great deal as well as a great product! The frangrance stays almost the whole day
(depending on your activities). Butoverall a great body wash!!
My brother has used this several times and absolutely loves it. It makes it easy for him when going on trips as he can just take this

Suds up and cleans great-This is my first time using this product (or any product from Harrys) and it's a positive experience. This body wash suds up well (doesn't take a lot to wash my whole body) and seems to clean good. The scent is different than most body washes I've used, it kind of reminds me of the smell while clearing heavy brush.. or maybe a tea bag.. or something in between. Great body wash-Great body wash. Boyfriend uses it every morning and skin is so soft and moisturized. The scent is lovely. I will totally recommend this product for daily use
Clean and smell good-MY son asked me to buy these and I have become a fan. I use the Axe Dark Temptation every day. I come out of my shower smelling nice and feel clean.
Smells great-Smells fantastic

It not strong scent-You're are going to be very disappointed, the scent is not strong and you don't feel that tingle feeling like other mint body washes that have peppermint.
Not a masculine scent-Smells like something a woman would use. Also noticed it gives me a rash when I use it. Should have returned it when I had the chance.
It definitely smells a lot more like Sage than it does citrus. Has kind of a woodsy smell. The scent isn't unpleasant but it wasn't what I was expecting. Moisturizers your skin very well though.
